named-native-query.name: Destination.seeDestinations
named-native-query.query: SELECT id, name AS nameD FROM destination WHERE state = 'A'

named-native-query.name: Destination.seeDestinationId
named-native-query.query: select id idDest from destination where name = :pDest

named-native-query.name: Destination.seeDestinationsPerPackage
named-native-query.query: select dest.name from destination dest where dest.id = (select id from package where name = :pPackage)

named-native-query.name: Destination.destinationForReservation
named-native-query.query: select d.name from destination d join reservation_destination rd on d.id = rd.destination_id join reservation r on r.id = rd.reservation_id where r.id = (select id from reservation where user_id = :pClientId)

named-native-query.name: Transportation.seeTransportationbyDestination
named-native-query.query: select t.id as id, t.name as name, t.price as price from transportation t where t.destination_id = :pDest and t.state = 'A'

named-native-query.name: TripInsurance.seeTripInsurancebyDestination
named-native-query.query: select t.id as id, t.type as type, t.price as price from trip_insurance t where t.destination_id = :pDest and t.state = 'A'

named-native-query.name: Meals.seeMealbyDestination
named-native-query.query: select m.id as id, m.type as type, m.price as price from meals m where m.destination_id = :pDest and m.state = 'A'

named-native-query.name: Accommodation.seeAccommodations
named-native-query.query: select name nameAc from accommodation where id = (select id from destination where name = :pDest)

named-native-query.name: Accommodation.seeAccommodationbyDestination
named-native-query.query: select a.id as id, a.name as name, a.price as price, a.lodging as lodging from accommodation a where a.destination_id = :pDest and a.state = 'A'

named-native-query.name: Accommodation.accommodationForReservation
named-native-query.query: select a.name from accommodation a join reservation_accommodation ra on a.id = ra.accommodation_id join reservation r on r.id = ra.reservation_id where r.id = (select id from reservation where user_id = :pClientId) and a.destination_id = (select id from destination where id = :pDest)

named-native-query.name: Package.seePackages
named-native-query.query: select name namePa, img imgP from package
